thread.title: Oak Ridge Boys, the Browns inducted into Hall of Fame
thread.title_full: Oak Ridge Boys, the Browns inducted into Hall of Fame - Times Union

author: timesunion.com
title: Oak Ridge Boys, the Browns inducted into Hall of Fame
text:
Photo: Al Wagner, Al Wagner/Invision/AP Image 1 of / 1   1 FILE - In this June 12, 2015 file photo, Duane Allen, from left, Joe Bonsall, William Lee Golden, and Richard Sterban of The Oak Ridge Boys perform at LP Field at the CMA Music Festival in Nashville, Tenn. On Sunday, Oct. 25, the Oak Ridge Boys will be inducted into the Country Music Hall of Fame. (Photo by Al Wagner/Invision/AP, File) FILE - In this June 12, 2015 file photo, Duane Allen, from left, Joe Bonsall, William Lee Golden, and Richard Sterban of The Oak Ridge Boys perform at LP Field at the CMA Music Festival in Nashville, Tenn. On ... more Oak Ridge Boys, the Browns inducted into Hall of Fame 1  /  1 Back to Gallery NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) â€” Two of country music's top vocal harmony groups, the Oak Ridge Boys and the late Jim Ed Brown and his sisters Maxine and Bonnie, have been inducted into the Country Music Hall of Fame.
Also inducted during a ceremony Sunday night in Nashville, Tennessee, was the late guitar great Grady Martin .
Garth Brooks , Trisha Yearwood , Dierks Bentley , Vince Gill and Marty Stuart performed tributes.
Oak Ridge Boys members Joe Bonsall , Duane Allen , William Lee Golden and Richard Sterban each received a medallion as the newest members of the hall. Jim Ed Brown was inducted at his bedside a few days before his death in June, and his sisters received their medallion during the ceremony.
Martin, who played with Elvis Presley , Johnny Cash , Patsy Cline and Willie Nelson , died in 2001, and his son accepted the honor on his behalf.
